name: Design Review
description: Review design documents and validate with stakeholders.

subtasks.name: Conduct Review Meetings
subtasks.description: Organize meetings with stakeholders for design review.

subtasks.name: Collect Feedback
subtasks.description: Gather feedback and comments from reviewers.

subtasks.name: Update Design Documents
subtasks.description: Revise design documents based on feedback.

subtasks.name: Approve Design
subtasks.description: Obtain formal approval of design documents.
